硾字的基本解释

硾
zhuì
古同“缒”，拴上重物往下沉：“是拯溺而硾之以石也。”
揣量物体的重量。

硾
chuí
捣，敲打：“第一池纸匀硾之，易软少毛。”

硾
duǒ
石头。

硾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》馳僞切，去寘，澄。］
亦作“磓2”。
(1)系以重物使之下沉。
(2)垂；挂。
(3)通“捶”。舂；捣。
(4)引申为锤炼。

硾字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页831第26
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】馳僞切【正韻】直類切，?音縋。【說文】擣也。【玉篇】鎭也，笮也。【呂氏春秋】硾之以石。　又【集韻】都果切，音朵。石貌。

硾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
硾字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
iodide
zhuì
Gu Tong "Jiang", tied a heavy object to sink: "It is the lifesaving but the stone is also used."
Measure the weight of the object.
iodide
chuí
Pounding, beating: "The first pool of paper is uniform, easy to soft and less hairy."
iodide
duǒ
stone.
iodide
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guangyun" cuts falsely, sets and clears. ]
Also known as "磓2".
(1) Sink down with heavy objects.
(2) Hanging; hanging.
(3) Through "beating". Pound; pound.
(4) The extension is tempering.
iodide
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　硾; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 831 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Pseudo-cutting [Zheng Yun] Straight-cutting,? [Said the text] Do it too. [Jade articles] Xi Ye, Ruo Ye. 【Lu Shi Chun Qiu】The stone is used for the 硾.　[Jiyun] All fruits are cut and sound. Stone appearance.
